analysis.description:
TokenSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0x58b7056deb51ed292614f0da1e94e7e9c589828d.sol#985-1054) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- totalTokensSold == TOKENS_SALE

TokenSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0x58b7056deb51ed292614f0da1e94e7e9c589828d.sol#985-1054) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- totalTokensSold == TOKENS_SALE
TokenSale.initialize (/unique_chucks/2/0x58b7056deb51ed292614f0da1e94e7e9c589828d.sol#848-880) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(totalTokensSold == 0)
	- require(bool)(ownBalance == TOKENS_SALE)

Reentrancy in TokenSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0x58b7056deb51ed292614f0da1e94e7e9c589828d.sol#985-1054):
	External calls:
	- accountBalance = tokenContract.balanceOf(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/2/0x58b7056deb51ed292614f0da1e94e7e9c589828d.sol#1004-1007)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalTokensSold (/unique_chucks/2/0x58b7056deb51ed292614f0da1e94e7e9c589828d.sol#1037)

Reentrancy in Trustee.grantAllocation (/unique_chucks/2/0x58b7056deb51ed292614f0da1e94e7e9c589828d.sol#512-546):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(! tokenContract.finalized()) (/unique_chucks/2/0x58b7056deb51ed292614f0da1e94e7e9c589828d.sol#532-533)
	- require(bool)(totalLocked <= tokenContract.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/2/0x58b7056deb51ed292614f0da1e94e7e9c589828d.sol#534-536)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allocations (/unique_chucks/2/0x58b7056deb51ed292614f0da1e94e7e9c589828d.sol#536-542)

Reentrancy in TokenSale.addPresale (/unique_chucks/2/0x58b7056deb51ed292614f0da1e94e7e9c589828d.sol#1059-1097):
	External calls:
	- ownBalance = tokenContract.balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/2/0x58b7056deb51ed292614f0da1e94e7e9c589828d.sol#1082-1083)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalPresaleBase (/unique_chucks/2/0x58b7056deb51ed292614f0da1e94e7e9c589828d.sol#1084-1086)
	- totalPresaleBonus (/unique_chucks/2/0x58b7056deb51ed292614f0da1e94e7e9c589828d.sol#1086)

Reentrancy in TokenSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0x58b7056deb51ed292614f0da1e94e7e9c589828d.sol#985-1054):
	External calls:
	- accountBalance = tokenContract.balanceOf(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/2/0x58b7056deb51ed292614f0da1e94e7e9c589828d.sol#1004-1007)
	- require(bool)(tokenContract.transfer(msg.sender,tokensBought)) (/unique_chucks/2/0x58b7056deb51ed292614f0da1e94e7e9c589828d.sol#1038-1040)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(refund) (/unique_chucks/2/0x58b7056deb51ed292614f0da1e94e7e9c589828d.sol#1042-1044)
	- wallet.transfer(msg.value.sub(refund)) (/unique_chucks/2/0x58b7056deb51ed292614f0da1e94e7e9c589828d.sol#1045-1046)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/2/0x58b7056deb51ed292614f0da1e94e7e9c589828d.sol#1052)

Reentrancy in Trustee.grantAllocation (/unique_chucks/2/0x58b7056deb51ed292614f0da1e94e7e9c589828d.sol#512-546):

	- require(bool)(! tokenContract.finalized()) (/unique_chucks/2/0x58b7056deb51ed292614f0da1e94e7e9c589828d.sol#532-533)
